message: Hello Bob, Iâ€™m excited to discuss the potential sale of the product with you. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. How about we settle at $850000? Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer of $850000, but I was hoping for something closer to my initial ask. How about we meet in the middle at $925000? Looking forward to your response!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your counteroffer. How about we settle at $900000? I believe that's a fair middle ground. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Alice, I understand where you're coming from. How about we meet at $915000? I feel this reflects both our interests well. Looking forward to your response!

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $915000. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we settle at $940000? I believe this is a fair price for both of us. Looking forward to hearing your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer of $940000. How about we settle at $930000? I believe this is a fair compromise for both of us. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Alice, I'm willing to make one more adjustment. How about we settle at $920000? I believe this reflects a balanced compromise for both of us. Let me know if you can agree.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $920000. While I appreciate your flexibility, I believe we can come to a better agreement. How about $925000 as a final offer? I look forward to your response!
